roleset.name: make bigger
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to enlarge.01. Enlarge.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: Postop changes: the caliber is enlarged from 1 cm to 2 cm and there is no calcification.

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: Multiple mesenteric lymph nodes are enlarged by the pathology.
